metadata.title: CVE-2019-15903 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In libexpat before 2.2.8, crafted XML input could fool the parser intochanging from DTD parsing to document parsing too early; a consecutive callto XML_GetCurrentLineNumber (or XML_GetCurrentColumnNumber) then resultedin a heap-based buffer over-read.

criterions.comment: expat: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
